# Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
```

# Data 
```{r}
setwd("~/Desktop/WinQ_2021/Fish497/Assignment-5")
fish_data <- read.csv("data/siscowet.csv")
reduced_fish_data <- select(fish_data,locID, len, wgt)
```


# Figures


## Length vs Weight Subplots
```{r}
ggplot(reduced_fish_data, aes(x=len,y=wgt)) +
 geom_point() +
  xlab("Length (mm)") +
  ylab("Weight (g)") +
  facet_wrap('locID') 

```

## Violin Plot
```{r}

p = ggplot(fish_data, aes( x = len, y = wgt, fill = locID))
p + geom_violin()

```

## Box Plot 
```{r}
p = ggplot(fish_data, aes( x = len, y = wgt, fill = locID))
p + geom_boxplot()


```
